Articles.Content:
Why do I see everyone on "green" as moderators? o\_O

Even myself

> 
> Why do I see everyone on "green" as moderators? o\_O
> Even myself

Check your calendar. ;-)

As a new mod, I must inform you that you are also a mod now. So is everyone else. It's just a new thing squad is trying out ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I'm moving this thread to Forum Games...

We were simply overwhelmed by the amount of people applying to be a moderator, so we decided to tackle the problem Oprah style: YOU get to be a moderator, and YOU get to be a moderator etc.. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
How did I know this was going to be the joke? (I literally imagined this last night when thinking about today)

Can't do moderator stuff ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Ah well. Too much responsibility ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
